contributionDescription:
I want to be an ambassador and create content. You can find my posts on optimism on Twitter or Reddit. I help people learn more about optimism. Here you can see some examples of the content I wrote about optimism
Experience has proven that tokens created in a bear market with a strong and focused team will do wonders in a bull market. For example, look at the past of $matic $avax and $ftm
Among the tokens that have emerged in this bear market, I give op a high rating
Since it has a smart and purposeful team, 
You must have seen the popularity of 
optimism
 among users Popularity and having a strong community is the strength of any network
